title: Tom Buckman
text:
Tom Buckman (born Thomas Harry Buckman; March 7, 1947 in <a href="Fort%20Worth%2C%20Texas">Fort Worth, Texas</a>) is a former professional <a href="American%20football">American football</a> <a href="tight%20end">tight end</a>.
Career.
Buckman played with the <a href="Denver%20Broncos">Denver Broncos</a> of the <a href="American%20Football%20League">American Football League</a> during the <a href="1969%20AFL%20season">1969 AFL season</a>. He had also previously been drafted by the <a href="Green%20Bay%20Packers">Green Bay Packers</a> in the twelfth round of the <a href="1969%20NFL%20Draft">1969 NFL Draft</a>.
He played at the collegiate level at <a href="Texas%20A%26amp%3BM%20University">Texas A&M University</a>.
